article: prime minister junichiro koizumi started the new year by visiting a shrine honoring japan 's war dead thursday _ a decision that brought a swift rebuke from china and south korea and could provoke an outcry over tokyo 's largest planned deployment of troops abroad since world war ii .
abstract: koizumi visits controversial shrine on new year 's day
